title: The Silent Patient
author: Alex Michaelides
synopsis: Alicia Berenson's life is seemingly perfect. That is until she shoots her husband in the face and never speaks another word.

title: Where the Crawdads Sing
author: Delia Owens
synopsis: Kya Clark, known as the Marsh Girl, has survived alone in the marshes of North Carolina for years. But when a murder occurs, she becomes a suspect.

title: Becoming
author: Michelle Obama
synopsis: Michelle Obama invites readers into her world, chronicling the experiences that have shaped her, from her childhood in Chicago to her time as First Lady of the United States.

title: Educated
author: Tara Westover
synopsis: Tara Westover recounts her journey from being raised in a strict and abusive household in rural Idaho to earning a PhD from Cambridge University.

title: The Testaments
author: Margaret Atwood
synopsis: Set 15 years after the events of The Handmaid's Tale, this novel explores the inner workings of Gilead and the lives of three women.

title: The Institute
author: Stephen King
synopsis: A group of children with special abilities are held captive in an institution where they are subjected to sinister experiments.

title: Normal People
author: Sally Rooney
synopsis: The complex relationship between Marianne and Connell unfolds over the course of their school years in a small Irish town.

title: Circe
author: Madeline Miller
synopsis: The story of the mythical witch Circe, who is banished to a deserted island and must find her place in the world of gods and mortals.

title: The Giver of Stars
author: Jojo Moyes
synopsis: Set in Depression-era America, five women join a traveling library and embark on a life-changing journey.

title: The Dutch House
author: Ann Patchett
synopsis: The story of a brother and sister, their childhood home, and the bond that carries them through five decades.

title: Dune
author: Frank Herbert
synopsis: A complex tale of politics, religion, and interstellar travel.
